column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3: してみてもいい
column4: Sure, I'll give it a try.

column3: 勘弁してください
column4: Anything but that.

column3: 挑戦する
column4: Bring it.

column3: やっぱり無理です
column4: Actually, no.

column3:
この土俵から降りたり飛んでいったり
倒れたりしたら負けゴロ！
ではガマンくらべを始めるゴロ！ガマンくらべぇえええ！！ 
スタートゴロォオ！！
column4:
If ya leave the ring or pass out,
it's all over! You lose! Got it?

OK... Now prepare yourself for the...CONTEST OF ENDURANCE!!
GOOOOOO!

column3: まだまだぁ！！
column4: Not yeett!!

column3: 余裕よゆ……！
column4: Piece of...cake!

column3: 誰か手を振ってる…
column4: Someone's wavin'...

column3: あ… じいちゃん…？
column4: Is that...Grandpa?

column3: ヒィー… ヒィー…
column4: Phew! Phew!

column3: 無理… ゴロォ…
column4: I can't...go on...

column3:
オマエはすごいゴロ！
まさかオレ達 ド根性三兄弟が負けるなんて！
column4:
You're amazing! I never woulda thought
the three Goron Blood Brothers could
lose to you, brother!

column3:
後ろにある炎に囲まれた土俵が見えるゴロ？
イヤな予感がするゴロォ？！
column4:
You see the ring behind me? The one
surrounded in fire? Do ya feel it in your
gut—what a bad idea it is to go there?

column3:
この土俵の上で限界までガマンすると
勇者の試練が現れる と伝えられているゴロ！
準備が出来たら この土俵に乗るゴロ！
特別なガマンくらべを始めるゴロ！
column4:
It's said that passin' this test will
reveal a shrine...or some such!

If ya think you're ready, climb into the
ring. Do that, and our special contest
of ultimate endurance will begin!

column3:
オマエには最高レベルの
ガマンくらべの挑戦権をやるゴロ！
column4:
In fact, I'm grantin' you the highest
honor—the chance to participate in
the contest of ULTIMATE endurance!

column3: オマエの予感はすこぶる正しいゴロ！
column4: Your gut is dead on, brother!

column3:
ボク達の先祖が修行した地…
その中でも特別キッツい ガマンの場だゴロ…
column4:
It's where our ancestors trained...
It's considered the toughest test known
to Goron kind!

column3: 特別な修行の場は この土俵の上ゴロよ…
column4:
That special training area is even harder
than the last ring...

column3:
おお…… なんという事ゴロ！
土俵から降りてしまったゴロ！
column4:
What's that about, brother?
Why'd ya leave the ring?!

column3:
おお…… なんという事ゴロ！
土俵から飛んでいこうとしたゴロ！
column4:
What's that about, brother? Ya tried to
get away from the ring!

column3:
ガマンくらべは土俵の上で行うのがルールゴロ！
降りてしまうとルール違反ゴロ！
column4:
The rules say ya have to complete the
contest in the ring! Leavin' is the
exact opposite of that!

column3:
ガマンくらべは土俵の上で行うのがルールゴロ！
飛んでいくのは ルール違反ゴロ！
column4:
The rules say ya have to complete the
contest in the ring! Leavin' isn't part
of it!

column3:
今回は残念ゴロけど
ガマンくらべは ここまでゴロよ…
column4:
It's way too bad things turned out this
way, brother. But I'm afraid the contest
of endurance ends here.

column3:
その上に立つという事は… やる気だな！ガマンくらべのルールは同じゴロ！その土俵の上から降りたり飛んでいったり
倒れたりしたらそこで終わりゴロ！
では特別なガマンくらべぇえええ！！
ンスタァートゴロォオオーー！！
column4:
You're standing up there, which can only
mean one thing... You ready to push
yourself to your limits, brother?!
The rules for this contest of ultimate
endurance are the same as ever.
Leave the ring or faint, and it's over!
OK! Time for the world famous...
CONTEST OF ULTIMATE ENDURANCE!!
GOOOOOO!

column3: もっと熱くゴロ！
column4: More heat, brother!

column3: 熱く！熱くゴロ！
column4: FIRE, brother!

column3: 溶岩のごとくゴロ！
column4: Hot like lava, brother!

column3: 何も怖くないゴロ！
column4: No fear!

column3: 世界が味方ゴロ！
column4: Seize the heat, brother!

column3: 無敵のオトコゴロ！
column4: A real trial by fire, brother!

column3: 魂を燃やすゴロ…
column4: My soul is on FIRE...

column3: バーニング魂ゴロ…
column4: Burning...soul...

column3: 燃え尽きるまでゴロ…
column4: Gonna get...burned out...

column3: んぬぅおおおおおお！！マーヴェラァアアアアス！！
column4: RAAAAARRRGGGGHHH!!SO EPIC, BROTHER!!

column3: ガマンくらべはオマエが一番だゴロ！最ッ高ゴロォオオオ！！
column4:
You won the contest of ultimate
endurance, little man!You're amazing!

column3:
オトコだゴロ！ オトコの中のオトコだゴロ！
素晴らしいゴロォオオ！！
column4:
What a powerful display! What fire!
That was somethin' else, brother!

column3:
ああ！勇者の試練が…
ほ祠が現れたゴロ！！
言い伝えは本当だったんだゴロ！！
column4:
Whoa! That's a shrine...or some such!
It really appeared, just like that!

So the legend is true, brother!!

column3:
マッスル！ここは先祖代々伝わる修行の場ゴロ！オレ達 ド根性三兄弟は
ここでガマンくらべをしているゴロ！
column4:
PUMP IT UP, BROTHER!This is our ancestral training ground!
Us three Goron Blood Brothers are in the
midst of a contest of endurance!

column3: どうだ オマエも！
column4: Hey, I have an idea!

column3: マッスル！オマエは以前にも来たオトコ！
column4: PUMP IT UP, BROTHER!Oh, you're the one who was here before!

column3: いい返事ゴロ！
column4: Good answer!

column3:
準備が出来たら この土俵に乗るゴロ！
ガマンくらべの始まりゴロ！
column4:
When you're ready, step up onto this
platform! Then the contest of endurance
will commence!

column3: なんとなんと弱気な発言！
column4: What a wobbly-kneed way of thinkin'!

column3: 気が変わったらいつでも来い！
column4:
If ya change your mind, come right
back here!

column3: ぬぅゴロゴー！！
column4: Uuurrrrggggh!!

column3:
そこの土俵に乗ったら
ガマンくらべの始まりゴロ！
column4:
The contest will begin when ya climb
into the ring, brother!

column3:
次のガマンくらべはキッツいゴロ！
まだ誰も成功していないゴロ！
column4:
This contest is really tough!
No one's passed it yet!

column3:
よく戻って来たゴロ！
特別なガマンくらべに挑戦するゴロか？！
column4:
Welcome back! Do ya wanna try the
contest of ultimate endurance?!

column3:
よし！ よく言ったゴロ！
では土俵の上に乗るゴロ！
column4:
That's the spirit! Now then, go climb
into the ring.

column3:
土俵の上に乗ったら
特別なガマンくらべの始まりゴロ！
column4:
The contest of ultimate endurance
begins as soon as ya climb into
the ring, brother!

column3:
なんだゴロ！無理なのかゴロ！
せっかく盛り上がったのに ビックリだゴロ！
column4:
What?! Ya don't wanna challenge
yourself? Disappointing, brother...
I was gettin' all fired up too!

column3:
今度のガマンくらべは
「暑さ」ではなく「熱さ」ゴロ！
気を抜くと身体が燃えてしまうゴロ！
万全の準備を整えるゴロ！
column4:
This contest won't just challenge you
with heat...but also with fire!

If ya lose your focus, your body will
catch fire! Make sure you're prepared
for this, brother!

column3:
ホット！強いオトコになるためのトレーニングゴロ！
どれだけの暑さに耐えられるか競っているゴロ！
column4:
FEEL THE BURN, BROTHER!We're trainin' to become strong and
powerful Gorons! Right now we're
competin' to beat the heat!

column3: オレ達と一緒に！
column4: Come join us!

column3: ホット！もう一度ここに来たという事は！
column4:
FEEL THE BURN, BROTHER!If you've come back here, then that
can only mean one thing...

column3: オマエの事は！
column4:
A guy like you has a burning passion
in his belly!

column3: 熱いオトコと見込んだのに！
column4:
And we thought you were a man who
had his priorities straight!

column3: オレ達はオマエの挑戦を！
column4:
We'll be here, waitin' on ya to grow
some grit.

column3: マッチョ！
column4: BEYOND MACHO!

column3: まだまだゴロォオ！！
column4: Not yet! Not yet!

column3: 熱いゴロ！熱いゴロ！
column4:
That fire in your eyes! I can almost see
the passion in your tiny belly!

column3:
そこは灼熱地獄ゴロ！
オマエは生きて帰れるかゴロ？！
column4:
That place is hotter than a freshly grilled
rock roast! You really think you can
handle it, brother?

column3:
ス スウェット…！ボク達は ゴロン族だけど暑さに弱いゴロ…そんなんじゃゴロンシティでやっていけないから
ここまで修行に来たんだゴロ…
column4:
So sweaty... Brother...We're Gorons...but the heat is too much
for us these days...It's too hot to handle in Goron City...
so we came here to train ourselves...

column3: ガマンくらべをしてみないかゴロ…？
column4:
Yeah! Come try the contest of endurance
yourself...brother!

column3: ス スウェット…！挑戦する気になったゴロ…？
column4:
So sweaty... Brother...Are you in the mood...to test your
endurance with us...brother?

column3: 熱いオトコと呼ぶゴロよ…
column4: It's inspiring...brother!

column3: ボク達の勘違いだったゴロ…？
column4: How could we have...been so wrong?

column3: ずっと待っているゴロ…！
column4:
When ya do...come show us what...
you're made of!

column3: ム ムッシュ…！
column4: I'm a manly Goron man... Brother...

column3: が がんばるゴロ…
column4: I'll do...my best...

column3: キミは すごいのかゴロ…？
column4: Are you...any good?

column3:
心を熱く燃やすゴロ…
それに比べれば炎なんて何ともないゴロ…
column4:
A Goron's heart burns with passion...
Compared to that, fire is nothin'...

column3:
マッスル！おお！ オマエはド根性ガケのトレーニングを
達成した四人目の兄弟！
ここは先祖代々伝わる修行の場ゴロ！
オレ達はここでガマンくらべをしているゴロ！
column4:
PUMP IT UP, BROTHER!Oh! It's the fourth Goron Blood Brother!
The one who somehow beat our famous
Gut Check Challenge!
This is our ancestral training ground,
little man! We're smack in the middle
of a contest of endurance!

column3:
ホット！もっと強いオトコになるための
挑戦をするゴロ？！
ここでは どれだけの暑さに耐えられるか
競っているゴロ！
column4:
FEEL THE BURN, BROTHER!We're trainin' to become even manlier
Goron men, brother! Right now we're
competin' to see who can beat the heat!

column3:
ス スウェット…！さすが ド根性ガケのトレーニングを
達成しただけあるゴロ…
ボク達は ゴロン族だけど暑さに弱いゴロ…そんなんじゃゴロンシティでやっていけないから
ここまで修行に来てるんだゴロ…
column4:
So sweaty... Brother...Of course, since ya beat the Gut Check
Challenge, you'll wanna try this too.

We're Gorons, but we can't really stand
this extreme heat either...That's why we came here to train!
After this, we'll be able to handle the
extra heat in Goron City, no problem.

column3:
マッスル！オマエはド根性ガケのトレーニングを
達成した四人目の兄弟！
column4:
PUMP IT UP, BROTHER!Oh! It's the fourth Goron Blood Brother!
The one who beat our famous Gut Check
Challenge!

column3:
マッスル！ん？！ オマエはド根性ガケのトレーニングを
受けている最中のオトコ！
ここは先祖代々伝わる修行の場ゴロ！
オレ達はここでガマンくらべをしているゴロ！
column4:
PUMP IT UP, BROTHER!Hm? Ah! You're the little man who
attempted the Gut Check Challenge!

This here is our ancestral training
ground, brother! We're havin' a
contest of endurance!

column3:
ホット！ド根性ガケを途中で投げ出したオトコは
ここの暑さに耐えられるかゴロ？！
column4:
FEEL THE BURN, BROTHER!But does someone who abandoned the
Gut Check Challenge really stand a
chance of beatin' the heat?!

column3:
ス スウェット…！ここで鍛えて
ド根性ガケに そなえるといいゴロ…
ボク達は ゴロン族だけど暑さに弱いゴロ…そんなんじゃゴロンシティでやっていけないから
ここまで修行に来てるんだゴロ…
column4:
So sweaty... Brother...You should train here before ya try to
take on the Gut Check Challenge.

We're Gorons, but we can't really stand
this extreme heat either...That's why we came here to train!
After this, we'll be able to handle the
extreme heat in Goron City, no problem.

column3:
マッスル！ド根性ガケも ガマンくらべも
途中のオトコ！
column4:
PUMP IT UP, BROTHER!Hey! You're the little man who's tryin' to
beat the Gut Check Challenge and the
contest of endurance!

column3:
ムムッ？！
オマエ耐火の装備を持ってるゴロ？
オトコなら そんなものに頼ってはダメゴロ！
己の体だけで挑めゴロ！！
column4:
HUH?! Is that heat-resistant gear ya
have there, brother?

A real Goron man shouldn't have to rely
on wussy stuff like that! Goron up and
take the challenge without any help!

column3:
おお…なんという事ゴロ！
いつの間にか耐火の装備を身に着けてるゴロ！
column4:
Wait... How did this happen?! When did
ya pull the ol' switcheroo and put on
heat-resistant gear, brother?

column3:
特別なガマンくらべは オトコを試す試練ゴロ！
耐火の装備に頼るのは失格だゴロ！！
column4:
Our sacred contest of endurance is a test
of grit, brother! Use that heat-resistant
nonsense, and you'll be disqualified!
